translations: n.（Evert）（瑞典、荷、德、美、希）埃弗特（人名）

phrs.translation: 使外翻, 外翻, 翻转, 名字
克里斯·埃弗特, 埃弗特, 伊夫德, 网球冠军
劳拉的死党阿曼达, 埃弗特, 阿曼达·埃弗特, 逸推的铁党阿曼达

sentences.sentence: My name is Evert, and I come from Holland.
sentences.translation: 我的名字叫艾福特，来自荷兰。

sentences.sentence: The other slug has also begun to evert the organ. You can see that it comes out from around the side of the head.
sentences.translation: 另外那只蜗牛也开始伸出器官。可以看到它正从另外一边头部那儿伸出。

sentences.sentence: In 1913, Jim and Evert McCabe, who led rival Motorcycle Delivery Company, agreed to merge with AMC and a new company was formed.
sentences.translation: 1913年，吉姆凯西和他的竞争对手，经营着“摩托车递送公司”的埃弗特麦克伯，决定合并为一家新公司，命名为“商业包裹递送公司（MPDC）”。
